sentences.en: By practising thrift we can cut out a great deal of unnecessary expenditure.
sentences.cn: 通过节约我们可以省去大量不必要的开支.

sentences.en: Diligence and thrift made him a possessor of warm fortunes.
He has the virtues of thrift and hard work.
sentences.cn: 他具备节俭和勤奋的美德.

sentences.en: His success was due to his industry and thrift.
sentences.cn: 他取得成功是由于他的勤俭.

sentences.en: His success was due to industry and thrift.
sentences.cn: 他的成功是由于他的勤俭.
勤劳和节俭有助于成功.

sentences.en: It is common sense to practise thrift.
Oppose extravagant eating and drinking and pay attention to thrift and economy.
sentences.cn: 反对大吃大喝,注意节约.

sentences.en: She ran her apartment with thrift and bought her clothes at trade prices.
sentences.cn: 她持家勤俭,买衣裳花的是批发价钱.

sentences.en: They demonstrated that personal virtues could bring success; theirs was the gospel of work and thrift.
sentences.cn: 他们用行动来表明个人的美德能带来事业的成功, 他们的信条是勤劳和节俭.

sentences.en: They were rightly praised for their thrift and enterprise.
sentences.cn: 他们勤俭节约，积极进取，得到了当之无愧的赞扬。

sentences.en: Thrift has become the prevailing practice.
Thrift is engrafted in his character.
To practice thrift is a virtue.
You cannot bring about prosperity by discouraging thrift.
sentences.cn: 不提倡勤俭节约就不会有繁盛.

words.tran_cn: 浪费的，不节约的；无价值的

trans.tran_cn: 节俭，节约，繁荣，茁壮成长，储蓄机构，〈英〉繁荣的手段，工作，劳动，[植] 海石竹
trans.tran_en: wise and careful use of money, so that none is wasted
